content: Is there a function that elaborates a rwRule such that it can be easily be stuffed into Lean.MVarId.rewrite? Somewhat related I don't understand why the whole Lean.Elab.Tactic.Rewrite uses Syntax instead of TSyntax. Is this for bootstrapping reasons or are there any big advantages of Syntax over TSyntax?
Many files have not been ported to TSyntax yet
